Stimpak

Cost
600 cr
Type
Equipment

Cures cryosickness. Restores 1d10 Health and grants Advantage to Strength and Combat for 2d10 minutes. There is a danger of addiction and/or overdose if used frequently.

NOTE: Pack of 5
